reviewtext: No. I wasn't referring toTJ Wisemen RCFM222 Remote Controlled Fart Machine No. 2I mean, some times a dry cleaner works better than a wet one. Often I'll do a dry one,then follow it up with a wet one likeMaxell VP-200 VHS Wet CleanerI wouldn't recommend a WET one followed by a DRY one... that might bind you all up orsomething. I hate it when my stuff gets all bound up and it requires being opened up bya professional.I hope I have layed/laid... PUT all the options ON the table. Buy these before they gothe way of... of.... VCRs!Thank you!
summary: We use a wet one and a dry one... great line from a straight man to a comic...
